mapper.sql: select t.RESULT_ID resultId, c.CLASS_ID classId, c.name className, b.STUDENT_ID studentId, b.STUDENT_NO studentNo, b.name studentName, t.SCORE score, d.SUBJECT_ID subjectId, d.name subjectName, a.EXAM_ID examId, a.name examName, e.YEAR_ID yearId, e.name yearName, f.TERM_ID termId, f.name termName, g.GRADE_ID gradeId, g.name gradeName, h.TYPE_ID typeId, h.NAME typeName from t_exam_result t left join t_exam a on t.EXAM_ID=a.EXAM_ID left join t_student b on t.STUDENT_ID=b.student_id left join t_school_class c on b.CLASS_ID=c.CLASS_ID left join t_subject d on t.SUBJECT_ID=d.SUBJECT_ID left join t_school_year e on a.YEAR_ID=e.YEAR_ID left join t_term f on a.TERM_ID=f.TERM_ID left join t_grade g on c.GRADE_ID=g.GRADE_ID left join t_exam_type h on a.TYPE_ID = h.TYPE_ID
